current_contact.agency: San Bernardino County Sheriff Department - Coroner Division

case_address_found_1: Under bushes east of the intersection Barton Rd. and east of Anderson Ave.
case_circumstances: John Doe #09-00 was a well-known transient living under bushes east of the intersection Barton Rd. and east of Anderson Ave., in Loma Linda.  He had being staying in this area between 6 and 8 years and had told locals and law enforcement that his name, however follow-up investigation located this person alive.  John Doe was found dead by natural causes; he had been dead approximately one month when found.  He was described as White, between 60 and 80 years of age, and stood about 5'9"¬ù.  He was estimated to have weighed about 180 lbs.  His hair and beard were gray.  He had a surgically implanted metal pin in his left proximal femur.
